title: A Matter of care: a review of the work of the Repatriation Department
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit, Frank Bagnall and Cecil Holmes
brief_description: Examines the work being done by the Department of repatriation. In the hospitals the effect of the Department’s activities can be seen in terms of the actual people who receive assistance and care. Also shows the social workers helping with problems of adjustment and therapy and training classes aimed at creating new interest in life. Script and direction by Cecil Holmes.
